EmailTemplate.name: Offer Letter
EmailTemplate.subject: Offer Letter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Opportunity.CreatedDate}
Dear {!Opportunity.Name},
I am writing to offer your son {!Opportunity.Student_Name__c} a place at St Andrew's Cathedral school in {!Opportunity.Offer_Date__c}.
{!Opportunity.Student_Name__c}'s enrolment is contingent upon the payment of the non-refundable Enrolment fee of $2,500 and completion of the Acceptance of Offer of Enrolment attached.
Please ensure: You have signed the Terms and Conditions of Enrolment on Page 3 You and your child have signed The School Code of Behaviour on Page 13 You and your child have signed the Policy of Acceptable Use of Computers on Page 14 You have completed the Emergency Contact Details on Page 15 You have completed the Data Collection on Page 16 You have read the Supplementary Information on Page 18.
Please return one copy and retain one copy for your records.
I feel sure that {!Opportunity.Student_Name__c} will settle happily into the new environment at St Andrew's. I look forward to your written acknowledgement of his enrolment as soon as possible.
Yours Faithfully
Bruce Perry BEd, Dip Teach
Registrar
(For)
